tool_description: Verifies the authenticity and current status of legal documents related to property ownership, liens, easements, and encumbrances through official record checks.

document_references.description: Array of legal document references or recording numbers

county_recorder_office.description: Name of the county recorder's office or jurisdiction

state.description: State where documents are recorded (two-letter abbreviation)

document_types.description: Types of documents to verify (deed, mortgage, lien, easement, etc.)

verification_depth.description: Level of verification: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid document reference: One or more document references are not found in official records.
Recorder office not accessible: Cannot access the specified county recorder's office database.
Invalid state code: State must be a valid two-letter abbreviation.
Document type not supported: One or more specified document types are not recognized.
Verification level invalid: Verification depth must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Too many documents: Maximum of 50 document references can be processed at once.
usage: Provide document recording numbers or references along with the county and state information. Specify document types and verification level for targeted verification.

verification_status.description: Overall verification status of submitted documents

verified_documents.description: List of successfully verified documents with details

unverified_documents.description: List of documents that could not be verified with reasons

document_status.description: Current status of each document (active, satisfied, expired, etc.)

last_verification_date.description: Date and time when verification was completed
